name: NNRewardPool
description: The NNRewardPool contract distributes the mining rewards, 15% share of the amount of nest-token produced by miners.

eventDecorators.name: NNRewardAdded
eventDecorators.description: When rewards are added to the pool.

eventDecorators.name: NNRewardClaimed
eventDecorators.description: When rewards are claimed by nodes.

functionDecorators.name: addNNReward
functionDecorators.description: Add rewards for Nest-Nodes, only governance or NestMining (contract) are allowed. The rewards need to pull from NestPool.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of Nest token as the rewards to each nest-node.

functionDecorators.name: claimNNReward
functionDecorators.description: Claim rewards by Nest-Nodes. The rewards need to pull from NestPool.

functionDecorators.name: loadContracts
functionDecorators.description: The function loads all nest-contracts, it is supposed to be called by NestPool.

functionDecorators.name: loadGovernance
functionDecorators.description: To ensure that all of governance-addresses be consistent, every contract besides NestPool must load newest `governance` from NestPool.

functionDecorators.name: nodeCount
functionDecorators.description: The callback function called by NNToken.transfer().

functionDecorators.name: unclaimedNNReward
functionDecorators.description: Show the amount of rewards unclaimed.

returnDecorators.name: reward
returnDecorators.description: The reward of a NN holder.
